message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $82.50. It's a fair compromise that still reflects the value of this unique item.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $78? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $78. I'm willing to make another concession, though. I can sell the product to you for $81. It's a good compromise that still reflects the value of this unique item.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $79? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to know that you're serious about buying the product. I can sell it to you for $80.50. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a done deal.

Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to go down to $80? I'm really interested in the product, and I think we're close to a deal.
